oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of children of J. M. D. Cates including Capt. Adolphus B. Cates
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Capt. Adolphus B. Cates, Co. D, 9th Tenn. Cav., CSA, (far right), was very upset about the division of the Union, but served in the Confederate army through the war. His father, Elder J. M. D. Cates, was fervently for the South. Adolphus B. Cates was serving in Newnan, Ga. at the end of the war, and later ran a newspaper in that town.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cates, Charles T.; Brandon, Ann E.;Parker, Florence; Cates, Josephine;Cates, Augustus Broadmore;Elliot, Leona Cates
